#id=1
#text=Taking a train somewhere can be an old-fashioned way of travel , but it can also be a lot of fun !
#id=2
#text=Train tracks do n't go everywhere anymore and they certainly are n't used as often .
#id=3
#text=This can make travel a little bit more difficult .
#id=4
#text=I decided to take a train to visit my friend one day .
#id=5
#text=I found a great deal on train tickets and decided to travel the country the old-fashioned way .
#id=6
#text=I ordered my tickets on a computer and arranged my whole trip .
#id=7
#text=I packed up my belongings , just like you would if you were flying a plane - both have a specific departure time !
#id=8
#text=Instead of going to an airport , I showed up at the train station with my luggage and train tickets .
#id=9
#text=I stowed away my luggage and handed my ticket over .
#text=I found a great car with a bed and a shared bathroom and had a very enjoyable train trip !
